iri_q1.Description: I daydream and fantasize, with some regularity, about things that might happen to me.

Levels.0: A- Does not describe me well

iri_q2.Description: I often have tender, concerned feelings for people less fortunate than me.

Levels.0: A- Does not describe me well

iri_q3.Description: I sometimes find it difficult to see things from the 'other guy's' point of view.

Levels.0: A- Does not describe me well

iri_q4.Description: Sometimes I don't feel very sorry for other people when they are having problems.

Levels.0: A- Does not describe me well

iri_q5.Description: I really get involved with the feelings of characters in a novel.

Levels.0: A- Does not describe me well

iri_q6.Description: In emergency situations, I feel apprehensive and ill-at-ease.

Levels.0: A- Does not describe me well

iri_q7.Description: I am usually objective when I watch a movie or play, and I don't often get completely caught up in it.

Levels.0: A- Does not describe me well

iri_q8.Description: I try to look at everybody's side of a disagreement before I make a decision.

Levels.0: A- Does not describe me well

iri_q9.Description: When I see someone being taken advantage of, I feel kind of protective towards them.

Levels.0: A- Does not describe me well

iri_q10.Description: I sometimes feel helpless when I am in the middle of a very emotional situation.

Levels.0: A- Does not describe me well

iri_q11.Description: I sometimes try to understand my friends better by imagining how things look from their perspective.

Levels.0: A- Does not describe me well

iri_q12.Description: Becoming extremely involved in a good book or movie is somewhat rare for me.

Levels.0: A- Does not describe me well

iri_q13.Description: When I see someone get hurt, I tend to remain calm.

Levels.0: A- Does not describe me well

iri_q14.Description: Other people's misfortunes do not usually disturb me a great deal.

Levels.0: A- Does not describe me well

iri_q15.Description: If I'm sure I'm right about something, I don't waste much time listening to other people's arguments.

Levels.0: A- Does not describe me well

iri_q16.Description: After seeing a play or movie, I have felt as though I were one of the characters.

Levels.0: A- Does not describe me well

iri_q17.Description: Being in a tense emotional situation scares me.

Levels.0: A- Does not describe me well

iri_q18.Description: When I see someone being treated unfairly, I sometimes don't feel very much pity for them.

Levels.0: A- Does not describe me well

iri_q19.Description: I am usually pretty effective in dealing with emergencies.

Levels.0: A- Does not describe me well

iri_q20.Description: I am often quite touched by things that I see happen.

Levels.0: A- Does not describe me well

iri_q21.Description: I believe that there are two sides to every question and try to look at them both.

Levels.0: A- Does not describe me well

iri_q22.Description: I would describe myself as a pretty soft-hearted person.

Levels.0: A- Does not describe me well

iri_q23.Description: When I watch a good movie, I can very easily put myself in the place of a leading character.

Levels.0: A- Does not describe me well

iri_q24.Description: I tend to lose control during emergencies.

Levels.0: A- Does not describe me well

iri_q25.Description: When I'm upset at someone, I usually try to 'put myself in his shoes' for a while.

Levels.0: A- Does not describe me well

iri_q26.Description: When I am reading an interesting story or novel, I imagine how I would feel if the events in the story were happening to me.

Levels.0: A- Does not describe me well

iri_q27.Description: When I see someone who badly needs help in an emergency, I go to pieces.

Levels.0: A- Does not describe me well

iri_q28.Description: Before criticizing somebody, I try to imagine how I would feel if I were in their place.

Levels.0: A- Does not describe me well
